about_the_game:
Basement of Hellish is a survival horror game with zombies in 1st person. Survive and struggle to find a way out in this horror game with tense and dark atmosphere.

Explore and manage your resources. Basement of Hellish is a game where every bullet matters.

Escape and find a way to survive in a basement infested with zombies and a powerful enemy.

Key Features:

  • Dark atmosphere
    Tense enviroment. The game takes place in a basement with dark atmosphere and contains elements of blood and gore.

  • Survival Horror
    Lot of zombies that can quickly surround and overwhelm you. Some are stronger than others.

  • Limited Resources
    Use your resources wisely, after all, spending a bullet wrong can cause your death.

  • Explore and find a way out
    Look for items that will help your survival, fight and find a way to escape of this basement.

Features:

  • Tense Atmosphere
  • Dark and tight places
  • Gore
  • FPS with fast combat
  • Some items are random to improve replayability
  • Limited ammo and batteries
  • Lot of zombies
  • A strong and tough enemy
  • 2 playable difficulties
  • 2 playable maps

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violence and gore

name: Basement of Hellish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic card with 2GB or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
